main event: A civilian reported seeing a bright light with a pulsating pattern changing from white to orange over Fort Worth, Texas.
interesting points: The object was described as round and the size of half a head of a pin., The sighting lasted for 2 minutes and 30 seconds., The object moved quickly in a north to south direction and disappeared slowly after dimming., The report indicated that there was no sound associated with the object., The conclusion of the report was 'Insufficient information (ICAO III)'.
sighted object: a bright light with a pulsating pattern
